attributes.action: appoint Keith Jones (taxpaying pensioner) as head of the team of people checking MPs (and other un-elected people in the political aristocracy of this country who have access to taxpayer pounds in the form of tax-free allowances) expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is plainly obvious that the people who are currently responsible for checking and approving claims are unable to read the book of rules and MUST be removed from the task.  As a tax paying pensioner I have a vested interest in ensuring that the money is properly spent.  I absolutely guarantee that there is no individual nor organisation nor amount of money can hold sway over the way I would exercise my responsibilities in this post.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
